Chef Dailde Marinho has been pilotting Restaurante Tamboril pans and stoves for the last 12 years, mixing international dishes and Brazilian flavors with sophistication and elegance. Bon App√©tit!
Tamboril serves a flawless buffet in a nice environment. It is the best place to eat in Inhotim and well worth the stop.

Very pleasant restaurant, all decorated, surrounding by garden, very attentive, polite staff and marvelous food.
It is a kind of buffet all you can eat.
There is very nice selection of beers and wine, although we stuck on beers.
Delightful place to rest for a while after strolling visiting the museum.
Highly recommended.

We had lunch mid-afternoon after arriving about 13:30. Looked at several options and selected this restaurant. Very good quality buffet with many options for salads, entrees and desserts. For the 4 of us without wine or beer, the total bill was R$379 (US$114)...not bad since it became our main meal instead of dinner. A very good value!

What else to say beyond the title just given. Tough beef, over cooked chicken, watery beans (you pay by the kilo, so they charge for water), dry cold pumpkin as part of the salad. 40 reais a kilo, a rip-off!

We had the buffet lunch which is not cheap, but the quality of the food was definitely above average and there was a wide variety of foods to choose from. Recommend to try the fresh fruit juices (not included in the fixed buffet price)
A wonderful restaurant to complement a wonderful place. The food is top notch with a great wine list to match. Most definitely recommend it.

The restaurant offers excellent food and good service and the view is breathtaking. The park is sponsored by the Brazilian Rounaet law, so there are lots of trained employees and all the works of art are well maintained.
Didn‚Äôt try the food. Only a nice beer in the garden. Lunch menu is about 20 usd. Beers (600ml) about 8 usd. Not cheap but charming.

titulo: A Delightful Luncheon in the Gardens of Inhotim
conteudo: We went to Tamboril two days in a row. Both days featured appetizer and dessert buffet, but the first day had an entree made to order and the second had a main course buffet. The dishes featured Brazilian food and were well prepared. Service was quite good all around. We ate in the garden area of the restaurant and enjoyed the beauty of the garden around us. Inhotim has beer and coffee that are both prepared solely for the site. Both were excellent and everything we ate was tasty. Within the realm of buffet, this was unusually good. The price is not cheap but it is fair for what you get.

titulo: Not a good price cost benefit
conteudo: It's a ok place. Reasonable food. But too expensive for it's overall quality. The place is good. Well decorated and with a good atmosphere but it is a little expansive for what you can find in the menu

titulo: The best restaurant in belo Horizonte.
conteudo:
The best meal inside the park, a value of only R$: 79.00 you have released a buffet with international food, varied where you find everything you want, you have access to an incredible amount of international wines.
Loved the food.
Loved the restaurant.
I loved the service.

I had a great time with my husband at Tamboril. It¬¥s located in one of the most interesting art and botanical museums of the world.It was a time for relaxing, drink a cold bottle of white wine and eat delicious food.

titulo: Buffet restaurante inside Inhotim Cultural Centre
conteudo: I would say the best restaurant. It serves nice buffet meals. Not gourmet but tasty and agreeable. With seatings indoor and outdoor .

The restaurant Tamboril is one of the restaurants located within the Inhotim Institute, a huge contemporary art centre and botanical garden in Brumadinho, Minas Gerais (about 60 km from Belo Horizonte). The place is beautiful and the restaurant, very nice. It works with buffet. Whereas it is a buffet, the dishes can be considered very good. There is a wide variety of salads, hot dishes and desserts. The service is very friendly and attentive.

titulo: If you pass by Inhotim this is a must stop
conteudo: If you are in Inhotim don't miss the chance to try this excellent buffet. All was fresh and we'll cooked.
The food is excellent, and very tasty. There is a menu of beers, including prized ones and the staff is very nice. We sat in the garden an it was a very romantic lunch.

We visited the park on a Friday and Tamboril was the only open restaurant.
As soon as we got there The hostess offered us a table and used the word refined several times to describe the restaurant and its food.
Quite the contrary it is not refined at all. It is just a normal restaurant where customers are valued proportionally for the amount they spent. We didn't like the self service option they offered ( not too many options for vegetarians) and we don't drink alcohol so we ordered some natural juices that came warm ( and the weather was hot) and took ages to come.
We need to wait a long time for our bill and even longer for our change!
The restaurant pretends to be refined but it is actually snobish for no reason.

Excellent food in beautiful setting. Healthy fare, cooked with pride and attention to detail using local ingredients. For both vegetarians and non-vegetarians, one always finds something delicious. Open for lunch only, buffet style. Excellent choice of local beers. Friendly service. English not spoken fluently. My favorite table is outside, next to the gardens.

titulo: NICE INTERNATIONAL FOOD WITH A 'MINEIRO'S' TASTE
conteudo: Health eatten. A variety of internationa and brazilian food with a Brazilian spicies. Nice salads and Nice desert. I sugest taste a bit of everything. Enjoy! Bom Apetite!

It is a bit expensive, but there the buffet is very good, with great variety of dishes.

Tip: you can take your dish on Tamboril buffet and seat at the Bar do Ganso, next to Tamboril. Bar do Ganso is more cozy and much nicer decor.
The receptionist may try to discourage you( as she did to me on february 7th, saying that the Bar do Ganso was full when it wasn¬¥t ), but it is worth to insist.

Very nice restaurant in the middle of the Garden ith lots of green around. Nicely designed and the food offer is interesting but a bit expensive but because there is not much other option, accepted. Nice selection of beers especial very good Wals pilsen! Overcharged as well!

You're surrounded by one of the most beautiful parks you have ever been.
So, no need to talk about atmosphere because it is something appart. The food is excellent and so is the buffet with plenty of tentations. The service is also very good.
Pack your luggage and move, you wont regret the trip.
Great food in a great place with great service, you don¬¥t need anything more to enjoy this all you can eat restaurant. It¬¥s fantastic!
Yes, the food Is good. The ambient is nice as well. Free buffet with some variety. Nice... But reeeeeally expensive! Until the bill it was amazing... After that, just nice
Amazing place and delicious food with a great variety in a buffet where you can chose which you want . Beautiful decoration and good service

I really liked it: food and location. Service is approximative but hey, you are in Brasil in the middle of nowhere! Food is outstanding for a buffet, very good quality and variety, well presented. Price is reasonable. If you come to Inhotim it's a must!!!

Brazilians seems to love buffets. I dont like buffet. Nothing is very good and fresh. And the hygiene is a open question. But here, in this beautiful Inhotim, the buffet was good, not cheap, but good and well presented. If you want the fine desserts, you pay a extra. It is OK.

If you visit Inhotim I recommend you to have lunch at Tamboril Restaurant. The restaurant has this name because of a big three outside the restaurant. The food is delicious and it is nice to stop there and relax after walking around the place to see contemporary art and the botanic garden. You will see that you deserve having a nice food after all. Have a nice lunch!!!!

It's amazing that the food tastes as fresh and good as it does with so many people eating. The salmon was moist, the beef tender, the vegetables crunchy, the sauces on everything delicious. Also great desserts. Just watch out not to eat too much - you still have a half day in front of you!
I like everything about that place but the food :( but you just have one other option in Inhotim and it is as bad as this.....bring your own snack ;)

I ate here with friends while visiting Inhotim. We were all hungry and the restaurant was very busy but a helpful young lady found us a table. It was a buffet lunch and I was expecting it to be very basic but there was a great variety of tasty food on offer - something for everyone.
The best place to eat inside Inhotim . Enjoy the desert and the regional cousine of Minas Geraes . Beautiful restaurant and very fast and polite service .
Such a nice ambience and also the food and drinks are delicious‚Ä¶ The service is really good too‚Ä¶ (great quality all you can eat buffet)
We were there on Friday and Sat. The service was a l√° carte on Friday and buffet on Sat. Delicious food on both days.
In general buffets show they are standing there for long periods That was not the case. Choices were good enough and cost benefit ratio very good

titulo: Good, fast and a little pricy
conteudo: Confortable and pretty restaurant buffet with the best of Brazilian cooking. A little pricey though.
A little bit expensive for some pockets but the food is worth and you can it what you want, including deserts.

titulo: Nice food on a spetacular place!
conteudo: In the middle of a Art island in Brazil, great place to recover some energy! Lots of options and even a La carte you will have a great meal. The atmosphere and the service are also at the same level.

Upon the recommendation at the entrance, we went for a lunch. The buffet was spectacular. The flavors were so unique. From caramelized quinces, pears to sausages,seafood,salads,fresh fruits...Couldn't stop myself trying almost every food offered at the buffet.Highly recommended. Love to go there anytime...

Very good restaurant, nice decoration and atmosphere. The food in the buffet is well prepared with good choices of regional cuisine. it is a must to eat there while visiting Inhotim galleries and botanical park
Best place to eat around inhotim, enjoy good food with amazing service . Because when you left there you will miss a lot!

titulo: An oasis of good food surrounded by nature in its best.
conteudo: I can only tell you that I could be no more surprised with the quality of food and ambience I found in a place so distant from any urban center.

The Tamboril is the oldest one in Inhotim park and also the most expensive between the options to eat in Inhotim. During the weekdays it's the only option for a complete meal. The cost is around 40USD per person. The food is amazing, also a good option for the vegetarians. The drinks are also great and not so expensive. There are some great local beers. No way to be disapointed with such a quality level. The owner of the park also eats there.
Delicious and varied buffet, beautifully displayed. Great service, excellent music.

titulo: Apenas um cozinheiro para todo o restaurante
conteudo: Pedimos um prato que estava bom, e o outro contudo dizia picanha, a mesma estava dura, como se tivesse sido preparada h√° algum tempo....

origem: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

conteudo: Lugar lindo e tranquilo, atendimento muito atencioso. O risoto de queijo coalho, couve e lingui√ßa estava excelente...... Visitem!

Que festa maravilhosa!!!! Ambiente agrad√°vel, uma das melhores comidas que j√° provei, com chef atencioso! A banda cumpriu seu papel deixando todos convidados bastante animados!!! Com certeza estarei presente na pr√≥xima comemora√ß√£o! Meu muito obrigado a toda equipe Verde Villas por toda receptividade!

Ap√≥s uma semana hospedado em Capit√≥lio comendo muito mal, viemos a Brumadinho para visitar o Instituto Inhotim.

Eis que deparamos com o Bistr√¥ Verde Villas e resolvemos tentar.

Tivemos uma maravilhosa experi√™ncia em Brumadinho.
Excelente atendimento do gar√ßom H√©lio, tendo cuidado em nos auxiliar com nosso beb√™ que estava dormindo, em nos indicar um delicioso vinho e trazer-nos um queijo enquanto aguard√°vamos o nosso prato.

Sa√≠mos j√° pensando no prato de amanh√£.

Desde a recep√ß√£o, com √≥timo atendimento, tudo estava excelente! Lugar agrad√°vel, comida deliciosa, pre√ßo justo, apar√™ncia boa, enfim, recomendamos!

O atendimento foi prejudicado, pois s√≥ tinha um gar√ßom dispon√≠vel. O dadinho de tapioca estava bem oleoso e o risoto de queijo canastra estava ok, mas quase n√£o senti o gosto do queijo. O bistr√¥ da pousada √© uma del√≠cia. √â constru√≠do com madeiras de lei, aberto, com vista para o verde, mobili√°rio e demais pe√ßas que no guarnecer, em perfeita harmonia. titulo: O espa√ßo mais charmoso da cidade de Brumadinho
conteudo: Lugar maravilhoso com uma decora√ß√£o impec√°vel excelentes vinhos e uma saborosa culin√°ria! Chef top!!

Um lugar aconchegante, otimo atendimento e culin√°ria primorisa. De dia, uma excelente op√ß√£o para realiza√ßao de eventos comemorativos e √† noite um recanto rom√¢ntico para celebra√ßoes √† dois. N√£o deixe de dar uma olhada na carta de vinhos.

conteudo: O Bistr√¥ al√©m de lindo tem um dos melhores card√°pios da regi√£o, comida muito boa e servem bons vinhos, os funcion√°rios s√£o atenciosos e o ambiente agrad√°vel. A pousada tamb√©m √© excepcional, confort√°vel e com belas acomoda√ß√µes, servem um delicioso caf√© da manh√£ com variadas op√ß√µes!

Gostaria muito de ter me hospedado na pousada Verde Villas tamb√©m, pessoal super atencioso, a comida ent√£o, muito gostosa!! O chef e sua equipe s√£o excelentes!!!! Parab√©ns bistr√¥!!! Tivemos uma noite muito agrad√°vel!!!

Bistr√¥ localizado em Brumadinho 3 km de Inhotim! Abre apenas no jantar a partir das 19:00 com card√°pio variado com excelentes op√ß√µes e comida maravilhosa.
Os valores s√£o Entrada em torno de R$ 19.00 e prato principal a partir de R$38.00! S√£o por√ß√µes grandes muito bem servidas e por exemplo a salada consegue dividir com outra pessoa.
Os gar√ßons s√£o super simp√°ticos e interagem no jantar contado curiosidades da culin√°ria e preparo!

O Bistr√¥ √© anexo √† Pousada, o que o torna ainda mais agrad√°vel, uma vez que depois de comer muito bem, e tomar um bom vinho, nem precisamos pegar carro ou outro transporte qualquer. √â um self-service e portanto pago por quilo.

Custo beneficio m√©dio. Restaurante comum com pre√ßo de ‚Äútop‚Äù. Obs.: Detalhe cobrar ‚Äútaxa de servi√ßo‚Äù por trabalho n√£o prestado e inaceit√°vel.
Grande restaurante a quilo, tipo bandeij√£o, bem organizado para suportar a multid√£o que atende todos os dias.

o melhor pre√ßo dentro de Inhotim - comida a kilo - com √≥timas e variadas op√ß√µes de saladas, comidas quentes e sobremesas

O restaurante fecha √†s 16h √†s sextas-feiras. Chegamos √†s 15:40. Servimo-nos. Havia quem viesse para nos pressionar, dizendo que o restaurante ia fechar e, por isso, pediam que nos serv√≠ssemos logo da sobremesa, mas demoraram a vir tirar o nosso pedido de bebida e a traz√™-las. Desagrad√°vel.

E, se tem que fechar √†s 16h, que encerrem a entrada √†s 15h. Comer correndo depois de uma visita prazerosa foi bem desagrad√°vel. √önico ponto negativo do Inhotim.

titulo: Op√ß√£o mais em conta em inhotim
conteudo: √â um buffet a quilo, mais simples que o do Testaurante Tamboril (que tamb√©m fica dentro de Inhotim), mas que tamb√©m √© muito bom, a comida √© bem temperada, os peixes t√™m a textura ideal e o espa√ßo √© muito bom. Aberto somente √†s ter√ßas e finais de semana, o restaurante por quilo do Inhotim n√£o fica devendo nada para o outro, que tem pre√ßo fixo, oferece boas op√ß√µes, ambiente lindo e atendimento √≥timo!

We had lunch here during our visit to Inhotim. It was a hot day and there was quite a line up to enter at the opening time but we were close to the front of the line and got in quickly. It's a typical Brazilian buffet restaurant where you serve yourself and then your plate is weighed to determine the cost. There was a good selection of dishes and the price was reasonable. It's located in a lovely spot close to the water. Many families were eating there.
Meals are good and the price is fair. Place is very nice and has a nice view of the park lake. Tamboril restaurant was close so this was the only option.
It‚Äôs not the greatest food , but it‚Äôs affordable, has a great view, it‚Äôs clean and practical. Doesn‚Äôt have that many veggie options. You pay per kilogram, they offer beers, wine, desert.

titulo: The other restaurant is much much better
conteudo: I stayed 2 days in Inhotim, had much 1 day in this kilograma restaurent and 1 day in the Tamboril restaurant. Tamboril is much much better and nicer. I would always prefer Tamboril over Oiticica
Self service restaurant, the meals are cost effective, close to the main attractions of the park. Many people but the service is fast enough

This is a very simple restaurant, with brazilian-style-confort-food and a brazilian way of restaurant service: you need to serve yourself and have you meal weighted. There are vegetable, lettuces, grains, beans, and some kinds of animal protein, like chicken breast, for example. The advantage is that you can have a meal the way you like.
Oiticica is a mid-range option inside Inhotim, which offers other more expensive places to eat. This is a very beautiful restaurant with great food and fair price.

Set within the beautiful park, surrounded by the most amazing contemporary art collection it is a great lunch option to rest in between art galleries. The fixed price menu is varied and generous with high quality ingredients.
This is a kilo restaurant, which means that you choose things from a buffet pay for the weight of it. Food was tasty, but there wasn't a huge variety to choose from.
Amazing view for a lunch, good food , the most cheap restaurant at inhotim, good music playing, and the service is excelent too!

This is the cheaper restaurant inside Inhotim , it's R$22,00 per plate buffet style but u can only make one plate lol . It was very good , homemade , typical Brazilian food, desserts were also delish. Now, they didn't have caipirinhas so the guy talked me into getting this artisanal beer and when I went to pay the bill , each beer was R$32,50 which is totally absurd . Kids eat free, they have tables outside in a garden w lake view , fabulous !

This informal, buffet-style restaurant overlooks the lake at the entrance to Inhotim, boasting good food, friendly service and nice atmosphere. Choose a table outside - the view is better and the place is quieter.

Nice food ( self-service with good local food ) nice service, a beautiful view of the park. Try to get a table watching the park or better a table outside. Enjoy the food while you rest from a long walkink journey!
Buffet excellent. Good selection of beers but be careful as I paid more for my beer than for the lunch. Lovely setting. No desserts the day we were there but excellent artisanal ice-cream lollipops

Normal self-service restaurant inside Inhotim. The food is nice and staff is also good. There is nothing special about it, except for the fact that it IS LOCATED INSIDE Inhotim. Far better than any other option inside the institute.

In an airy pavilion with a great terrace by the lake you can take in the beautiful scenery and some good Brazilian food. A welcome lunch stop during your visit of this amazing art-museum-cum-botanical-garden.

the ambiance is great, inside the Inhotim Park, gorgeous landscape and architecture. The food was very good, based on the Brazilian culinary with a sofisticated touch. Good service, good food preparation and beautiful environment.

I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the food, being a buffet in a park. There was a great variety of both hot and cold foods, and a bar if you wanted an adult beverage. There was a large crowd but the lines moved fast and tables were readily available. The only negative was you had to flag down a waiter to get your drink, you could not walk up to the bar and order.

It is a good place to rest in Inhotim after running around the park. Food is local and very basic, somewhat overcooked with very few vegetables but there is nothing wrong with it. It is not expensive and not very tasty but should be safe for travelers. At least, I did not get sick.

The restaurant is clean. The only problem is very slow beverage service. I eventually gave up on waiting and went myself to the bar to get that long sought after can of ice-cold coca zero. It is very crowded at noon to 1pm, so if you can, it is better to wait to 2 pm.

titulo: Good food, but be prepared for the crowds
conteudo:
During the two days we visited Inhotim, we went twice to have lunch at Oiticica. The first day, a Thursday, we succeeded; the second, a Saturday, we were defeated by the crowds.

This restaurant is the pay-by-weight alternative in Inhotim. The dining room is huge but very pleasant, with a high ceiling and large floor-to-ceiling windows that open to the park.

The food is offered in a long counter, with many hot and cold dishes, as well as desserts. Food quality is quite good, mostly local specialties. It is nice to be able to sample small portions to have a taste of everything.

There are a couple downsides, however.

The first is that lines are always huge. Take all the food you want the first time around, because you will probably not be willing to go back a second time. On our second day, we arrived 10 minutes before opening and people were already queuing up in several directions.

Some groups had reservations, which added to the confusion. After waiting for some time, we simply gave up and had some snacks in one of the cafes.

Additionally, I believe that staff is not really prepared to handle the crowds. The servers were friendly but it was difficult to catch their attention.

I only recommend Oiticica during off hours or weekdays.

titulo: Good food if you can handle the crowds
conteudo:

The food is offered in a long counter, with many hot and cold dishes, as well as desserts. Food quality is quite good, mostly local specialties. It is nice to be able to sample small portions to have a taste of everything.

There are a couple downsides, however.

The first is that lines are always huge. Take all the food you want the first time around, because you will probably not be willing to go back a second time. On our second day, we arrived 10 minutes before opening and people were already queuing up in several directions.

Some groups had reservations, which added to the confusion. After waiting for some time, we simply gave up and had some snacks in one of the cafes.

Additionally, I believe that staff is not really prepared to handle the crowds. The servers were friendly but it was difficult to catch their attention.

I just eat there because I was starving and I had been at tamboril (the other restaurant in Inhotim) and didn't like ....but I was disappointed as well terrible food, long lines .....bring your own snack to Inhotim ;)

I was there in a Tuesday - free entrance at Inhotim - at 15:30 when the place closes at 16:30 . So the buffet was incomplete with poor replacement . Overall the food is ok but you should go early to have a decent meal
Good option for a lunch during your visit to Inhotim Institute. Pay for the weight style with red meat/fish/chicken choices. May be crowd during the weekends and holidays.
Very good typical regional food from Minas Gerais, served in a pleasant environment. We spent about US20,00 per person to eat a decent quantity.

titulo: Fish restaurant with simple country charm
conteudo:
My husband and I prefer to avoid crows and like enjoying nature, so when it was time for lunch we went to Rancho do Peixe, a quiet place where we savored a fish meal looking at a pond and actually listening to birds singing, ducks quacking, geese honking and the wind blowing, without any background music being played.

To get there we drove a short distance from Belo Horizonte on a very easy paved road, except for the last kilometer that is a not too rough dirt road. The ride gave us amazing views of the city and mountains, and when passing below Serra da Moeda we saw gliders coloring the sky. Finding the restaurant is easy, just follow the signs on the road.

The place is a small very simple farm, the ambience is totally rustic, not fancy rustic. The service is courteous and caring, our waiter had that sweet peacefull demeanor and country charm.

We ordered Truta defumada com molho de hortel√£ (smoked trout with mint sauce) as an apetizer, and Moqueca de Piratininga (kind of a fish stew in coconut milk) as the main dish. Prices on the menu are for dishes that serve 2 people, but you can also order ¬Ω portions. Food is prepared at the moment, delicious and plentifull!

At our visit, on a Tuesday lunch hour, we were the only people there for the most part, perfect for us! Towards the end another couple arrived, and we assume they asked for music, for only then it started to play. We paid our bill with credit card and took our doggie bag with moqueca left overs to enjoy the next day.

titulo: Pleasant place with good food and excellent service
conteudo: This is a lovely place just outside Brumadinho, where we stayed before going to Inhotim the next morning. Brumadinho is a bit of a non-descript place with not much happening, so this was a pleasant find. It has a pousada (which we didn't stay at), a cafe/shop area (where we ended up eating on a quiet end of carnival) and a larger outdoor restaurant area (which was mostly deserted when we were there). They have excellent and well prepared local Mineiro food which we enjoyed thoroughly, but the highlight, bizarrely, was the pizza cooked in a bespoke pizza oven. Thin crust and just perfect, not the typical Brazilian over-cheesed calorie bomb. And the service was delightful. Attentive and polite without being in any way intrusive. A decent wine list and some really good cacha√ßas, which can be purchased after trying them. If in the area again, we shall be back.

titulo: Keep in mind: you are in the countryside

They give an interesting warning regarding the meat: even if you ask for ¬¥well done¬¥, the maximum they can do is ¬¥medium¬¥. Strange but funny. The pizzas are surprisingly good. Thin crust, good toppings and reasonable sizes. They also serve a number of local beers which you definitely should try. Note that on Saturdays there will be a local band playing the Brazilian and American versions of country music. Its bearable up to the point when the guy with the violin joins in... You just have to sit trough that part!

()
Eu, que n√£o tenho sangue de barata, levantei, fui atr√°s dela (isso mesmo, tive que ir atr√°s!) e disse para ela n√£o trazer a pizza porque j√° havia sido cancelada.

().

titulo: Lactose free dishes with great service
